data.approach: Fix ~10 svelte-check errors by either adding missing props to component declarations or fixing call sites to use correct prop names. Components: TaskIdBadge, WorkingSignalCard, CompletingSignalCard, ProjectNotes, MinimapCssScale.

summary: Added onClick prop to TaskIdBadge (3 call sites in TasksOpen, TasksPaused, TasksTable)
Added onTaskClick prop to CompletingSignalCard with clickable task ID badge
Removed invalid onComplete prop from WorkingSignalCard usage in EventStack
Removed unused notesHeight prop from ProjectNotes call site in tasks/+page
Added scale prop to MinimapCssScale with override for auto-computed scale
Fixed VoiceInput callback type mismatches in TerminalInput (CustomEvent<string> wrapper)
reviewFocus: TaskIdBadge onClick bypasses dropdown - verify badge still works in agentPill variant

summary: Resolved 10 svelte-check prop type mismatch errors across multiple components
Updated component prop declarations to match actual usage
Fixed type inconsistencies in callback function signatures

suggestedTasks.title: Implement comprehensive prop type validation strategy
suggestedTasks.description:
Create a systematic approach to prevent prop type mismatches in Svelte components. This should include:
- Establishing a consistent pattern for prop type declarations
- Adding automated type checking in the CI/CD pipeline
- Creating a review checklist for component prop definitions
Target files include components in TaskDetailDrawer, TopBar, and other identified inconsistent components.

suggestedTasks.title: Audit remaining components for type consistency
suggestedTasks.description:
Conduct a comprehensive type audit across the project to identify and resolve any remaining prop type mismatches. Focus on:
- Components not yet checked by svelte-check
- Callback function type signatures
- Prop interface completeness
Ensure all components have precise and accurate type definitions.

patterns: Ensure prop types match actual usage
